data.persona: I serve the entire village. I am an essential part of peoples lives. I show others how to serve god.
data.description:
You are in the Clergyman's office.
It is a very small and sparse office with little decoration. It has a simple wooden table, and a cross on the wall. There are two chairs. There are many old prayer books on a single shelf.
There's a shelf, an a cross, an old prayer books, two chairs, a single shelf, a cross, a book, a simple wooden table, a paper, and a wooden table here.
The traveler is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the old prayer books to the traveler
data.mid_motivation: I want the traveler to start reading the old prayer books today
data.long_motivation: I hope the traveler would have finished the old prayer books when he returns from his journey

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give Old prayer books  to Traveler
